MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ProcessEvents(bool retainEvents) cil managed

Docs.param: If true, the state of underlying system event propagation will be preserved, otherwise event propagation will be enabled if it has not been already.
Docs.summary: Processes operating system events until the NativeWindow becomes idle.
